posts.post_content:
So 2015 is here and I have decided to add another set to my collection. I am now looking to complete the T201 Mecca Double Folders Set. There is a total of 50 cards in the set and I have made a list below of the cards that I am looking for. If you don't see it in bold below then I still need it. Thanks for looking and with any help. I hope to put a dent into this set this year. 

Requirements 
1. SGC ONLY
2. Must be 40/3 or better

BOLD- Indicates I have 

 1 - William Abstein / John Butler
 2 - Eddie Collins / Frank Baker
 3 - Harry Baker / Thomas Downie
 4 - James Barrett / Grant McGlynn
 5 - John Lapp / John Barry
 6 - Chief Bender / Reuben Oldring
 7 - Zack Wheat / William Bergen
 8 - Roy Hartzell / Walter Blair
 9 - M. Huggins / Roger Bresnahan
10 - Christy Mathewson / Albert Bridwell
11 - Mordecai Brown / Arthur Hoffman
12 - Fred Clarke / R. Byrne
13 - John Evers / Frank Chance
14 - Harold Chase / Edward Sweeney
15 - Ed Cicotte / John Thoney
16 - H.L. Gaspar / Thomas Clarke
17 - Sam Crawford / Ty Cobb

20 - G.N. Rucker / Jake Daubert

40 - Walter Johnson / Gabby Street
41 - Frank La Porte / James Stephens

43 - A.P. Leifield / M.E. Simon
44 - John Lobert / Earl Moore
45 - Arthur McCabe / Charles Starr
46 - Joe McGinnity / Lewis McCarty
47 - George Wiltse / Fred Merkle
48 - Ed Walsh / Frederick Payne
49 - Torrence Turner / George Stovall
50 - Orville Woodruff / Otto Williams

Good luck on the set, Jesse. T201's have been fun to collect and they won't break the bank. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Good luck Jesse, great goals for 2015.
Have a few bucks to spend anyone out there have any t201's

Hi Jesse,

here are a couple that are available, $120 for the pair.

TTYL!

Cliff
